pageProduct.name: Skin Republic Gold Peel Off
pageProduct.description:
General Information

This luxurious gold peel-off mask combines the anti-aging benefits of gold with the deep cleansing properties of a peel-off mask. Rich in age-defying minerals and fruit extracts this mask intensely nourishes and smoothes for a luminous complexion.

Warnings

To ensure compatibility, it is advisable to test a small area of the skin before use.

Common Uses

  • Age-defying peel-off mask
  • Smoothes away fine lines and wrinkles
  • Fruit acids gently exfoliate for a brighter, more luminous complexion

Ingredients

24K Gold Peel-off Face Mask

Aqua/Water/Eau, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Titanium Dioxide(CI 77891), Glycerin, PEG-400, PVP, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Niacinamide, Allantoin, Silica, Bentonite, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Dextrin, Tin Oxide, Adenosine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Cyclodextrin, Rubus Fruticosus (Blackberry) Fruit Extract, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Punica Granatum Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Extensin, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Seed Extract, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Colloidal Gold, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Raspberry Ketone, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum/Fragrance.

Directions

Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin, avoiding the eye area, eyebrows, hairline and lips. Once completely dry, gently peel off mask starting from the outer edges. Wash off any residue with water. Follow with moisturiser or a Skin Republic Face Mask Sheet.
